actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to remove certain restrictions on certain land transferred by the United States to Hawaii before it attained statehood.

summary.text: Permits the State of Hawaii to use the revenue of proceeds from the disposition of specified lands at Sand Island, Hawaii, for any public purpose.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain restrictions on certain land transferred by the United States to Hawaii before it attained statehood.
